data.text:
Paul Stephenson Ellis, We Miss You! November 19, 2021

Posted by utechalumni in Memorial.

Tags: Death Announcement - Paul Stephenson Ellis OD JP, University of Technology Jamaica, UTech Jamaica

trackback

The College of Oral Health Sciences expresses sincere condolences to the family, friends and colleagues of Mr. Paul Stephenson Ellis O.D., J.P, former Accreditation Coordinator for the College of Oral Health Sciences, who died on Saturday October 30, 2021.

Mr. Ellis who was a former Lecturer in the School of Pharmacy, College of Health Sciences, joined the College of Oral Health Sciences in 2014 as the Accreditation Coordinator/Consultant.

He was instrumental in the preparation of the Academic Quality Audit for the College in 2015, the Institutional Self Study in 2017 and completed the Self Study documents for the Doctor of Medical Dentistry, Dental Hygiene and Dental Laboratory Technology Courses of Study. He spearheaded the preparation for the College’s Institutional Accreditation Visit in May 2018.

The Thanksgiving Service for the life of Mr. Paul Ellis will be held on Wednesday November 17, 2021 at 11am. Kindly refer to the YouTube link below:
